items: bludgeoning, piercing, and slashing from nonmagical attacks

blocks.name: Innate Spellcasting
blocks.text:
[NAME]'s spellcasting ability is Charisma (spell save DC SDC[CHA]). It can innately cast the following spells, requiring only verbal components:

At will: *detect evil and good*, *detect magic*, *detect thoughts*
3/day each: *bless*, *create food and water*, *cure wounds*, *lesser restoration*, *protection from poison*, *sanctuary*, *shield*
1/day each: *dream*, *greater restoration*, *scrying*

blocks.name: Shielded Mind
blocks.text: [NAME] is immune to scrying and to any effect that would sense its emotions, read its thoughts, or detect its location.

blocks.name: Bite
blocks.text: *Melee Weapon Attack:* ATK[DEX + 1] to hit, reach 5 ft., one creature. *Hit:* DMG[1d6 + DEX] piercing damage, and the target must succeed on a DC 13 Constitution saving throw or be poisoned for 24 hours. Until this poison ends, the target is unconscious. Another creature can use an action to shake the target awake.

blocks.name: Constrict
blocks.text: *Melee Weapon Attack:* ATK[STR + 1] to hit, reach 10 ft., one Medium or smaller creature. *Hit:* DMG[2d6 + STR] bludgeoning damage, and the target is grappled (escape DC 15). Until this grapple ends, the target is restrained, and [NAME] can't constrict another target.

blocks.name: Change Shape
blocks.text:
[NAME] magically polymorphs into a humanoid or beast that has a challenge rating equal to or less than its own, or back into its true form. It reverts to its true form if it dies. Any equipment it is wearing or carrying is absorbed or borne by the new form ([NAME]'s choice).
  In a new form, [NAME] retains its game statistics and ability to speak, but its AC, movement modes, Strength, Dexterity, and other actions are replaced by those of the new form, and it gains any statistics and capabilities (except class features, legendary actions, and lair actions) that the new form has but that it lacks. If the new form has a bite attack, [NAME] can use its bite in that form.

legendaryActions.description: [NAME] can take 3 legendary actions, choosing from the options below. Only one legendary action option can be used at a time and only at the end of another creature's turn. [NAME] regains spent legendary actions at the start of its turn.
